content: materials - 4 5 5 skeins of purl soho s posy 1 75% superwash merino 15% cashmere and 10% nylon each skein is approximately 159 yards/ 50 grams approximately 605 700 795 total yards required we used snapdragon pink - a set of us 2 3 mm double pointed needles 3 or long us 2 circular needles 4 for magic loop - a cable stitch holder 5 - a small crochet hook 6 and scrap yarn for provisional cast on 7 note an earlier version of this pattern was knit using 2 skeins of anzula s squishy in the color seaside click here 8 for more on that version gauge 33 stitches and 42 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes adult small medium large - finished foot circumference 7¼ 8¼ 9¼ inches unstretched - finished calf circumference at widest 9¼ 10¼ 11¼ inches unstretched - finished foot length adjustable - finished height from heel to top of cuff unfolded 22 inches unblocked sample we knit the adult medium designed for purl soho by whitney van nes 1 https //www purlsoho com/posy 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=968 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/provisional-cast-on-video/ 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/2012/11/21/whits-knits-little-cable-knee-highs/
